name: Temporal Pest
description:
Something has gone terribly wrong, you recall being on your way home from one of your countless adventures, but instead of your homeplanet looming now in front of you: a wormhole.

Inside and slowly swarming towards your end: intertemporal spiders. You have heard of these creatures before: they live inbetween time and space, setting up traps and ambushes at places where spacetime is especially isolated. Because they are so numerous, they have to feed off their prey as often as they can by manipulating time and trapping their prey in temporal loops.

But that means there is a chance for you to slip through and rip each of 'em a new one.

In this WIP release:

Don't let the spiders touch you!

up/down/left/right: move

space: advance dialog / stop moving fwd/bwd

esc: exit

r: restart
